channel.title: Drunken Zombie TV
channel.description:
Drunken Zombie TV is the video portion of our podcast. Here there will be some video reviews and interviews with people from horror. And also call our voicemail and leave us a message. 206-338-5566 Also stop by our new fully functional website www.drunkenzombie.com.
Vote For Drunken Zombie On Podcast Alley!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Zombies Drink For Free!!!!
channel.itunes:author: Drunken Zombie TV

item.title: Drunken Zombie TV Episode 7
item.description: One from the archive. We recorded this awhile ago but just now got it out. Enjoy and interview with the guys from Scotchworthy Productions and our review of Night Of The Living Jews.

item.title: Drunken Zombie TV Episode 6 - The Wrestling Episode
item.description:
Drunken Zombe TV - The Wrestling Episode
Uploaded by DrunkenZombie
In this episode we chat with Rowdy Roddy Piper about the movie They Live, he tells us about fighting cancer, and who he would like to fight next. We also review the movie Wrestlemaniac. Enjoy.
item.dc:creator: Drunken Zombie TV
item.itunes:summary:
Drunken Zombe TV - The Wrestling EpisodeUploaded by DrunkenZombie
In this episode we chat with Rowdy Roddy Piper about the movie They Live, he tells us about fighting cancer, and who he would like to fight next. We also review the movie Wrestlemaniac. Enjoy.

item.title: Crazy Uncle Randy Interviews Chris Sarandon
item.description: Crazy Uncle Randy has a quick chat with Chris Sarandon as part of our video addition to our Fright Night audio episode. To check that out and more go to www.drunkenzombie.com.
item.dc:creator: Drunken Zombie TV
item.itunes:summary: Crazy Uncle Randy has a quick chat with Chris Sarandon as part of our video addition to our Fright Night audio episode. To check that out and more go to www.drunkenzombie.com.

item.title: Drunken Zombie's Texas Chainsaw Massacre Special
item.description: Drunken Zombie chats with Gunnar Hansen and John Dugan about the original TCM. Enjoy their stories of how they got involved with the project, what it's done for them, and where they've gone since. <object width="425" height="355"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/L2Nyt6UXJz0"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/L2Nyt6UXJz0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" width="425" height="355"></embed></object>
item.dc:creator: Drunken Zombie TV
item.itunes:summary: Drunken Zombie chats with Gunnar Hansen and John Dugan about the original TCM. Enjoy their stories of how they got involved with the project, what it's done for them, and where they've gone since.

item.title: Drunken Zombie TV Episode 4 - Tony Todd and Stupid Teenagers Must Die
item.description:
Drunken Zombie Episode 4 - Stupid Teenagers and Tony Todd
Uploaded by DrunkenZombie
In this episode we have a chat with Tony Todd about the possiblity of Candyman teaming up with Freddy. We review the movie STUPID TEENAGERS MUST DIE! And we finish it off with Crazy Uncle Randy getting a whippin'. So sit back and enjoy. As always feel free to email us at drunkenzombiepodcast@gmail.com and now call us and leave us a voicemail at 206-338-5566.

item.title: Drunken Zombie TV - Friday The 13th: Summer Camp Stories
item.description:
Since we had such a great time talking about Friday The 13th in our last audio episode we figured we'd give you a nice video companion piece to go along with it. For Friday The 13th: Summer Camp Stories we caught up with three people who helped make Jason the hockey mask wearing psycho we all love.
<embed type="video/quicktime" src="http://media.revver.com/qt;sharer=134406/624293.mov" pluginspage="http://www.apple.com/quicktime/download/" scale="aspect" cache="False" height="376" width="480" autoplay="False"></embed>
item.dc:creator: Drunken Zombie TV
item.itunes:summary: Since we had such a great time talking about Friday The 13th in our last audio episode we figured we'd give you a nice video companion piece to go along with it. For Friday The 13th: Summer Camp Stories we caught up with three people who helped make Jason the hockey mask wearing psycho we all love.

item.title: Drunken Zombie TV Episode 2: Brew Of The Dead
item.description:
For our second episode of Drunken Zombie TV we chat with Indiana's premiere folk-core band Devil's Brew, find out how to handle our toys with Life Lessons from Crazy Uncle Randy, and finally we review Devil's Brew in Brew Of The Dead.
<embed type="video/quicktime" src="http://media.revver.com/qt;sharer=134406/602600.mov" pluginspage="http://www.apple.com/quicktime/download/" scale="aspect" cache="False" height="376" width="480" autoplay="False"></embed>

item.itunes:summary: For our second episode of Drunken Zombie TV we chat with Indiana's premiere folk-core band Devil's Brew, find out how to handle our toys with Life Lessons from Crazy Uncle Randy, and finally we review Devil's Brew in Brew Of The Dead.

item.title: Drunken Zombie TV Episode 1
item.description: Welcome to the first episode of Drunken Zombie TV. Our video show. For the first episode we review the movie IT'S MY PARTY AND I'LL DIE IF I WANT TO, get some Life Lessons from Crazy Uncle Randy, and Dave has a chat with Tom Savini.
item.dc:creator: Drunken Zombie TV
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the first episode of Drunken Zombie TV. Our video show. For the first episode we review the movie IT'S MY PARTY AND I'LL DIE IF I WANT TO, get some Life Lessons from Crazy Uncle Randy, and Dave has a chat with Tom Savini.
